flow.descriptionCdata:
51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.01c44072-3d4d-4ac3-a848-2c792f029c9b.prompt=Enter a value for serverId 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.0c37437c-186b-4fc3-8b8c-6ae397ab5572.prompt=Password of SA user. 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.0cc87e04-ec51-40d8-80a6-9b6973cd13a0.prompt=Enter a value for coreHost 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.17112a5e-4c60-4c7b-94fe-5b00aaab8fe6.prompt=Enter a value for coreUsername 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.18f7fa93-5ba4-40dc-a211-51acd98fa1a5.prompt=Process Instance ID 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.1c584384-865d-4b10-9d4c-8a4dc841c9be.prompt=Username of the SA. 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.2f4e3d36-dc4b-4841-81a9-7be9fb4b00cc.prompt=Enter a value for coreUsername 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.3b2af738-045c-43c5-92f6-48c2eeda890d.prompt=User Identifier 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.50b62d49-d627-4d57-86f0-f4116220c496.prompt=Enter a value for corePassword 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.6cb3eef6-e3e0-4405-9d14-a14fa5045696.description=Starts a remediation on the given server using a set of attached/detached software policies. If the software policies information is not provided, then a full software policy remediation is performed. Inputs\: coreHost - The DNS name or IP Address of your SAS core. corePort - The port to Connect to your SAS core on. coreProtocol - The protocol to connect to your SAS core with. Either HTTP or HTTPS. coreUsername - The username for host. corePassword - The password for host. coreVersion - The version of SAS to use. serverName - The name of the server to remediate. serverId - The ID of the server to remediate. If provided, the server name is ignored. softwarePoliciesNames - The names of the software policies to remediate against (separated by comma). The software policies need to be attached/detached to/from the server before the remediation takes place. softwarePoliciesIDs - The IDs of the software policies to remediate against (separated by comma). The software policies need to be attached/detached to/from the server before the remediation takes place. If this input is provided, then 'softwarePoliciesNames' is ignored. wait - An integer value specifying how many milliseconds should be waited for the job to finish. If not specified the job is started, but may not have finished. rebootOption - Reboot Option for Remediating a server. It could be one of [suppress, per_action, at_end] or it can be left blank. Where\: - suppress - Suppress all reboots; - per_action - Reboot after each installation or uninstallation; - at_end - Reboot at the end of remediation; - left blank (no value provided) - Reboot as specified by individual software items. Responses\: success - The operation completed successfully. failure - Something went wrong. Returns\: returnResult - The id of the created job. 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.6eb5458d-d817-4ca0-b831-cbe962b2909e.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.7666ff15-d56d-4216-ace7-29f75c7064df.prompt=Enter a value for coreHost 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.907295ea-fcfa-4c9e-a3c3-a7161e4f12d9.prompt=Enter a value for attachableName 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.960d7126-bfb2-4d1e-9e29-4de85f1a62eb.description=Attaches a software policy to a server/device group/hypervisor. Inputs\: coreHost - The DNS name or IP Address of your SAS core. corePort - The port to Connect to your SAS core on. coreProtocol - The protocol to connect to your SAS core with. Either HTTP or HTTPS. coreUsername - The username for host. corePassword - The password for host. coreVersion - The version of SAS to use. policyName - The name of the policy to attach. policyID - The ID of the policy to attach. If this input is provided, then 'policyName' is ignored. attachableName - The name of the attachable object to attach the policy to. attachableID - The ID of the attachable object to attach the policy to. If this input is provided, then 'attachableName' is ignored. attachableType - The type of the attachable object. Can be\: SERVER, DEVICE_GROUP, HYPERVISOR. Responses\: success - The operation completed successfully. failure - Something went wrong. 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.9a4d0c87-bc51-40f2-a48f-236b759b355f.prompt=User Identifier 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.a5dee01c-c566-4590-a48d-76dda1ce2ebb.prompt=Enter a value for serverName 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.b2b992ef-e954-4415-a217-1663739dfa59.description=
This operation can be used to find the SA version in the form of 'sasXXX' (Similar to the entries in the Selection List 'SAS Version'). Output of this operations  could be mapped to the input parameter 'coreVersion' which is used in other SA Operations. For SA version 6.x, this operation is not supported. For other SA versions, if the output variable 'coreVersion' is reported with 'UNKNOWN', then user is recommended to manually find the SA version to use in other SA Operations.

Inputs\:
coreHost - IP Address or DNS name of the SA Web Service.
corePort - HTTP(S) port of SA Web Service. By default it is '443'.
coreProtocol - HTTP / HTTPS. By default it is 'HTTPS'.
coreUsername - Username of the SA.
corePassword - Password of SA user.

Outputs\:
status - Operation completion Status.
coreVersion - SA version.  It could be one of [sas7, sas75, sas78, sas9, sas91, UNKNOWN].

Responses\:
success - retrieved successfully
failure - failed to retrieve data
51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.d5617296-6561-461f-89de-c137eaa1488c.prompt=IP Address or DNS name of the SA Web Service. 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.db2d259a-3d55-4238-a2f8-6088900528f5.prompt=Enter a value for policyName 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.ddfe3b7f-e21c-4709-857d-f4da1f9961a0.prompt=Enter a value for corePassword 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.e32b7322-e0d0-445d-a680-e020a917f968.prompt=Process Instance ID 51689d8f-2abe-4230-809d-2ec3b6552a46.ecdf4563-aba2-41cd-9f8a-916a82afca29.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
flow.name: Apply Software Policy

staticBinding.value: Failed to remediate the software policy ${saPolicyName} on server ${hostName}
Failed to attach software policy ${saPolicyName} on server ${hostName}
